body:
This represents the official release of Apicurio Studio, version 0.2.46.Final.

The following issues have been resolved in this release:

* [#1070](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/1070) UI also supports external http/s references.
* [#1069](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/1069) display read-only view of imported entities.
* [#1068](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1068) Support http/s external $refs
* [#1067](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/1067) Added a UI to import data types and responses.
* [#1063](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/1063) Added an ApiCatalog-based IReferenceResolver impl in the UI.
* [#1062](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/1062) initial implementation of a API catalog for the OpenAPI editor
* [#1053](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1053) Support validation of external references
* [#1052](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1052) Implement UI versions of the IReferenceResolver interface
* [#1051](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1051) Create an API Catalog service in the UI
* [#1050](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1050) Editor: read-only display of "imported" data types
* [#1049](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1049) Editor: Add the "Import Data Type" action/wizard to the Master view
* [#1048](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1048) Add "Download Dereferenced API" option to API details page
* [#1047](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1047) Editor: Add the "imported" label in the "Master" panel
* [#1046](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1046) Add a "dereference" boolean query param to the JAX-RS layer for downloading an API design
* [#1045](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1045)  Create IResourceResolver java impl for apicurio-internal references
* [#1044](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1044) Create IResourceResolver java impl for external http/s references
* [#1036](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1036) Preview throws "internal server error" without further explanation
* [#1023](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1023) Bug: Beta 2.45 in docker will not start 
* [#764](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/764) Support references to component objects across specification documents
* [#681](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/681) External references for common definitions?
* [#401](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/401) Linking External Documents


For more information, please see the Apicurio Studio's official project site:

* [General Information](http://www.apicur.io/)
* [Download/Quickstart](http://www.apicur.io/download)
* [Blog](http://www.apicur.io/blog)
name: Beta 2.46
